page.title: 11GENERAL RECREATION _ LAND
page.content: This is a popular area for a variety of sports and pastimes. 1.){Rock climbing}is popular on the limestone cliffs especially the{ {Seven Sisters}and near{Symonds Yat.} 2.){Orienteering}takes place somewhere in the forest on most weekends and most events are organised by the{N. Gloucestershire Orienteering {Club.}Within thid D-Block there is an event starting and finishing at{ {Bracelands Campsite (5513)}during most years. The next will be on 15th. March 1986. 3.){Walkling}_ As well as the{Wye {Valley Walk}which follows the old railway, there are{forest trails}(red arrows) run by the{Forestry Commission and{Way marked paths}(yellow arrows) run by the{Ramblers Association. { }4.){Camping}_ See page 6. {etc. etc. etc. etc. etc. etc. etc.}
